高质量Awesome List存档

zxl19 2021-05-31
  • GitHub
  • Archive

GitHub上的高质量Awesome List存档，主题涵盖C++（包括CMake）、Python、SLAM等。

Awesome List来源

An awesome list is a list of awesome things curated by the community.
There are awesome lists about everything from CLI applications to fantasy books.
The main repository serves as a curated list of awesome lists.

搜索awesome+关键词即可，关于全部awesome list的一阶、二阶、三阶汇总可见：

  1. sindresorhus/awesome
  2. bayandin/awesome-awesomeness
  3. geekan/awesome-awesome-awesome
  4. MunGell/awesome-for-beginners
